name: nodetool-mlx
description: Apple Silicon MLX nodes for Nodetool

nodes.title: MFlux
nodes.description:
Generate images locally using the MFLUX MLX implementation of FLUX.1.
    mlx, flux, image generation, apple-silicon

    Use cases:
    - Create high quality images on Apple Silicon without external APIs
    - Prototype prompts locally before running on cloud inference providers
    - Experiment with quantized FLUX models (schnell/dev/krea-dev variants)

    Recommended models:
    - schnell: Fastest model, good for quick generations (2-4 steps)
    - dev: More powerful model, higher quality (20-25 steps)
    - krea-dev: Enhanced photorealism with distinctive aesthetics
    - Freepik/flux.1-lite-8B-alpha: Lighter version of FLUX
    - Quantized 4-bit models: Reduced memory usage versions of the official models

properties.name: prompt
properties.default: A vivid concept art piece of a futuristic city at sunset
properties.title: Prompt
properties.description: The text prompt describing the image to generate.

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: MFLUX model variant to load. Options include official models (schnell, dev, krea-dev), third-party community models (Freepik/flux.1-lite-8B-alpha), and quantized 4-bit versions for reduced memory usage.

properties.name: quantize
properties.title: Quantize
properties.description: Optional quantization level for model weights (reduces memory usage).

properties.name: steps
properties.title: Steps
properties.description: Number of denoising steps for the generation run.

properties.name: guidance
properties.title: Guidance
properties.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. Used by dev/krea-dev models.

properties.name: height
properties.title: Height
properties.description: Height of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: width
properties.title: Width
properties.description: Width of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation. Leave as 0 for random.

nodes.title: MFlux ControlNet
nodes.description:
Generate images with MFlux ControlNet guidance using local MLX acceleration.
    mlx, flux, controlnet, conditioning, edge-detection

    Use cases:
    - Apply edge-aware guidance via ControlNet canny models
    - Leverage local Apple Silicon acceleration for conditioned generations
    - Upscale images using ControlNet upscaler weights

properties.name: prompt
properties.title: Prompt
properties.description: Primary text prompt for image generation.

properties.name: control_image
properties.title: Control Image
properties.description: Reference image used by ControlNet for conditioning.

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Base Flux model to load for conditioned generation.

properties.name: controlnet_model
properties.title: Controlnet Model
properties.description: ControlNet weights that match the selected Flux base model.

properties.name: quantize
properties.title: Quantize
properties.description: Optional quantization level for model weights (reduces memory usage).

properties.name: steps
properties.title: Steps
properties.description: Number of denoising steps for diffusion.

properties.name: guidance
properties.title: Guidance
properties.description: Classifier-free guidance scale when supported by the selected model.

properties.name: controlnet_strength
properties.title: Controlnet Strength
properties.description: Blend factor between ControlNet conditioning and base model prior.

properties.name: height
properties.title: Height
properties.description: Height of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: width
properties.title: Width
properties.description: Width of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation. Leave 0 for random.

nodes.title: MFlux Depth
nodes.description:
Generate images with depth guidance via the MFlux depth pipeline using local MLX acceleration.
    mlx, flux, depth, conditioning, structure-preserving

    Use cases:
    - Use a depth map to control structural composition while keeping prompt-driven appearance
    - Provide both source image and depth map to transfer scene layout to a new generation
    - Generate depth-guided outputs when only a depth map is available (source image optional)

properties.name: prompt
properties.default: Highly detailed cinematic portrait with depth cues
properties.title: Prompt
properties.description: Primary text prompt for the depth-guided generation.

properties.name: image
properties.title: Image
properties.description: Optional reference image used for depth extraction or as a content guide.

properties.name: depth_image
properties.title: Depth Image
properties.description: Optional depth map to guide geometry. If omitted, depth is inferred from the image when provided.

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Depth model weights compatible with the Flux depth pipeline.

properties.name: quantize
properties.title: Quantize
properties.description: Optional quantization level for model weights (reduces memory usage).

properties.name: steps
properties.title: Steps
properties.description: Number of denoising steps for the generation run.

properties.name: guidance
properties.title: Guidance
properties.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. Defaults higher to encourage prompt adherence in depth mode.

properties.name: height
properties.title: Height
properties.description: Height of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: width
properties.title: Width
properties.description: Width of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation. Leave 0 for random seed.

nodes.title: MFlux ImageToImage
nodes.description:
Transform an existing image using the MFLUX MLX implementation of FLUX.1.
    mlx, flux, image-to-image, apple-silicon

    Use cases:
    - Apply prompt-based edits to an existing image without relying on external APIs
    - Experiment with strength-controlled transformations locally

properties.name: prompt
properties.default: Refine this image with cinematic lighting
properties.title: Prompt
properties.description: Text prompt describing how to transform the input image.

properties.name: image
properties.title: Image
properties.description: Base image that will be transformed.

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: MFLUX model variant to load for image-to-image generation.

properties.name: quantize
properties.title: Quantize
properties.description: Optional quantization level for model weights (reduces memory usage).

properties.name: steps
properties.title: Steps
properties.description: Number of denoising steps for the transformation.

properties.name: guidance
properties.title: Guidance
properties.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. Used by dev/krea-dev models.

properties.name: image_strength
properties.title: Image Strength
properties.description: Blend factor between the original image and the generation (0 keeps original).

properties.name: height
properties.title: Height
properties.description: Height of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: width
properties.title: Width
properties.description: Width of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation. Leave as 0 for random.

nodes.title: MFlux Inpaint
nodes.description:
Inpaint portions of an image locally using the MFLUX MLX implementation of FLUX.1 Fill.
    mlx, flux, inpainting, mask editing

    Use cases:
    - Restore masked regions with prompt-guided content
    - Blend new elements into an existing composition while preserving unmasked areas

properties.name: prompt
properties.default: Refine the masked region with additional details
properties.title: Prompt
properties.description: Text prompt describing what to generate inside the mask.

properties.name: image
properties.title: Image
properties.description: Base image that will stay fixed outside the masked regions.

properties.name: mask
properties.title: Mask
properties.description: Mask image: white areas will be regenerated, black areas remain untouched.

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Inpainting model to load. Defaults to FLUX.1 Fill dev weights.

properties.name: quantize
properties.title: Quantize
properties.description: Optional quantization level for model weights (reduces memory usage).

properties.name: steps
properties.title: Steps
properties.description: Number of denoising steps for the inpainting run.

properties.name: guidance
properties.title: Guidance
properties.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. Higher values tend to better respect the prompt in Fill mode.

properties.name: height
properties.title: Height
properties.description: Target output height in pixels.

properties.name: width
properties.title: Width
properties.description: Target output width in pixels.

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation. Leave 0 for random seed.

nodes.title: MFlux Kontext
nodes.description:
Generate images using Kontext reference image fusion on Apple Silicon.
    mlx, flux, kontext, reference guidance

    Use cases:
    - Leverage a reference image and prompt to produce stylistically consistent outputs
    - Perform context-aware edits without external services
    - Prototype Kontext-driven workflows locally

properties.name: prompt
properties.default: Create an atmospheric scene based on the reference image
properties.title: Prompt
properties.description: Primary text prompt for Kontext-guided generation.

properties.name: reference_image
properties.title: Reference Image
properties.description: Reference image that will guide the Kontext generation.

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Kontext model weights compatible with the Flux Kontext pipeline.

properties.name: quantize
properties.title: Quantize
properties.description: Optional quantization level for model weights (reduces memory usage).

properties.name: steps
properties.title: Steps
properties.description: Number of denoising steps for the generation run.

properties.name: guidance
properties.title: Guidance
properties.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. Kontext often works best with moderate values.

properties.name: height
properties.title: Height
properties.description: Height of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: width
properties.title: Width
properties.description: Width of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation. Leave 0 for random seed.

nodes.title: MFlux Outpaint
nodes.description:
Outpaint an existing image by extending the canvas using the MFLUX Fill pipeline.
    mlx, flux, outpainting, canvas extension

    Use cases:
    - Expand scene borders while maintaining continuity with the original image
    - Add sky, foreground elements, or contextual scenery around a provided image

properties.name: prompt
properties.default: Expand the scene with complementary surroundings
properties.title: Prompt
properties.description: Prompt guiding what to generate in the newly added canvas regions.

properties.name: image
properties.title: Image
properties.description: Base image that will remain visible inside the padded region.

properties.name: mask
properties.title: Mask
properties.description: Mask defining areas to regenerate (white) after padding. If blank, generated automatically.

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Outpainting model to load. Defaults to FLUX.1 Fill dev weights.

properties.name: quantize
properties.title: Quantize
properties.description: Optional quantization level for model weights (reduces memory usage).

properties.name: steps
properties.title: Steps
properties.description: Number of denoising steps for the outpainting run.

properties.name: guidance
properties.title: Guidance
properties.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. Higher values tend to better respect the prompt in Fill mode.

properties.name: padding
properties.title: Padding
properties.description: CSS-style padding string (e.g. '128', '96,64', '10%,5%') describing additional canvas to create before generation.

properties.name: height
properties.title: Height
properties.description: Target output height after padding.

properties.name: width
properties.title: Width
properties.description: Target output width after padding.

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation. Leave 0 for random seed.

nodes.title: MFlux Redux
nodes.description:
Generate images using reference images with Flux Redux guidance on Apple Silicon.
    mlx, flux, redux, reference fusion

    Use cases:
    - Blend multiple reference images with a text prompt to steer style and content
    - Reinterpret a photo collection into a coherent output while keeping structure from the references
    - Experiment locally with the Flux Redux pipeline without external APIs

properties.name: prompt
properties.default: Create a cinematic composition inspired by the reference images
properties.title: Prompt
properties.description: Primary text prompt for the Redux generation.

properties.name: redux_image
properties.title: Redux Image
properties.description: Reference image that will guide the generation.

properties.name: redux_image_strength
properties.title: Redux Image Strength
properties.description: Optional strength value (0-1) for the reference image.

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Redux model variant to load. Defaults to FLUX.1 Redux dev weights.

properties.name: quantize
properties.title: Quantize
properties.description: Optional quantization level for model weights (reduces memory usage).

properties.name: steps
properties.title: Steps
properties.description: Number of denoising steps for the generation run.

properties.name: guidance
properties.title: Guidance
properties.description: Classifier-free guidance scale. A moderate default balances prompt adherence and references.

properties.name: height
properties.title: Height
properties.description: Height of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: width
properties.title: Width
properties.description: Width of the generated image in pixels.

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation. Leave 0 for random seed.

properties.name: text
properties.title: Text
properties.description: Text content to synthesize into speech.

properties.name: speed
properties.title: Speed
properties.description: Speech speed multiplier for Kokoro (0.5–2.0).

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Kokoro model variant to load.

properties.name: voice
properties.title: Voice
properties.description: Voice preset supported by Kokoro (e.g. af_heart, am_adam, bf_emma).

properties.name: lang_code
properties.title: Lang Code
properties.description: Language code or name (a=American English, b=British English, e=Spanish, etc.).

properties.name: temperature
properties.title: Temperature
properties.description: Sampling temperature passed to the Kokoro generator.

nodes.title: Sesame TTS
nodes.description: MLX Sesame / CSM text-to-speech with reference audio cloning.

properties.name: text
properties.title: Text
properties.description: Text content to synthesize into speech.

properties.name: speed
properties.title: Speed
properties.description: Speech speed multiplier for Sesame (0.5–2.0).

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Sesame/CSM model variant to load.

properties.name: reference_audio
properties.title: Reference Audio
properties.description: Reference audio clip used for voice cloning.

properties.name: text
properties.title: Text
properties.description: Text content to synthesize into speech.

properties.name: speed
properties.title: Speed
properties.description: Spark speed preset (very_low, low, moderate, high, very_high).

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Spark model variant to load.

properties.name: voice
properties.title: Voice
properties.description: Optional Spark voice preset.

properties.name: pitch
properties.title: Pitch
properties.description: Spark pitch preset.

properties.name: gender
properties.title: Gender
properties.description: Spark voice gender.

nodes.title: MLX Whisper
nodes.description:
Transcribe an audio asset using MLX Whisper.
    whisper, mlx, asr, speech-to-text

    - Uses MLX for efficient Apple Silicon acceleration
    - Emits final transcript on `text` and segments on `segments`

properties.name: model
properties.title: Model
properties.description: Model to use for transcription

properties.name: length_ms
properties.title: Length Ms
properties.description: Chunk length in milliseconds before decode

properties.name: compression_ratio_threshold
properties.title: Compression Ratio Threshold
properties.description: Threshold for gzip compression ratio; above this, the result is treated as failed.

properties.name: logprob_threshold
properties.title: Logprob Threshold
properties.description: Average log probability threshold; below this, the result is treated as failed.

properties.name: no_speech_threshold
properties.title: No Speech Threshold
properties.description: Threshold for no-speech probability; if exceeded and logprob is low, the segment is considered silent.

properties.name: condition_on_previous_text
properties.title: Condition On Previous Text
properties.description: If True, the previous output is used as a prompt for the next window, improving consistency.

properties.name: word_timestamps
properties.title: Word Timestamps
properties.description: If True, extracts word-level timestamps using cross-attention and dynamic time warping.

properties.name: chunk
properties.title: Chunk
properties.description: Streaming input chunk. Provide audio chunks (PCM16 base64 or bytes).
